page.title: 10Sports
page.content: One of the most popular activities is sports; everyone questioned played some kind of sport or game regularly. 100% play a sport regularly 45% take part in organised sport This list shows the percentage playing each sport and in brackets the percen- tage playing in an organised team or club. Tennis 74% (--) These sports Table Tennis 70% (--) are played by Cycling 59% (2%) one or two Soccer 55% (20%) people in clubs Swimming 48% (13%) or teams: Cricket 45% (13%) Diving; Karate; Squash 35% (--) Horse Riding; Badminton 28% (4%) Gymnastics; Golf 19% (--) Judo; Netball; Rugby Union 19% (15%) Softball. Fishing 16% Basketball 13% (6%)
